content: Nothing spells out relaxation after a long day quite like coming home and resting your noggin on a nice soft brick. Apart from cushioning your head with utmost comfort, the distinct industrial pattern on the pillow provides the perfect decor for any urban loft or flat.

Spend the day at the beach with some cold drinks and still have your laptop, cell phone, and other electronic devices charged with this solar panel drink cooler. It’s perfect for sneaking out of your cubicle, spending the day at the beach, and still getting work done.

The hand pedal float is the ultimate accessory for doing nothing in your pool. If you drift too far away from the edge of the pool, where your drink is, you can  steer your way back with the hand pedals. Don’t bother with getting wet at all – just lay back, pedal around, and enjoy.

Whether you’re a novice or seasoned vocabulary connoisseur, the one of a kind scrabble rug makes the perfect addition for the home. This fashionable rug is made from the finest materials and is designed as an exact replica of the original scrabble board.

The single task notepad rejects the busy and fast paced lifestyle so many are caught up in and caters to those who prefer to take life one step at a time. Each page provides just enough space to write down a single task so you don’t overwhelm yourself.

Nothing screams ‘alpha male’ quite like a bare chest blessed by a bountiful mane of hair spread across it. The hairy chest sweater will make you irresistible to the opposite sex and help you fight back against the new trend of man-scaping that’s ruining our world.

The clunky armor of medieval knights has got nothing on the functional Mongol armor. Apart from providing protection and enhanced mobility for optimum fighting, the armor’s regal and bold design is sure to instill fear in the heart of any foe.

The breast comfort pillow allows you to lay flat on your stomach without experiencing any pain or discomfort on your lady gagas. The pillow features an innovative design which includes an opening where the breasts can rest without being compressed by the weight of the body.

Enjoy Mario like you’ve never seen him before – on a custom made Mobius strip. The Super Mario Mobius strip depicts the first level of the classic Nintendo game on the peculiar and mind-boggling shaped surface of a Mobius strip. A must have for any math geek or gamer.

Fighting valiantly for the integrity of Reddit, the Knights of /New protect the front lines from terrible user submissions. This life size statue was built to honor their years of service – and even features a downvote sword that glows blue when re-posts are nearby.

One shot the competition from unbelievable distances with the paintball sniper rifle. Designed for the serious paintball marksman, this sophisticated piece of equipment allows soldiers to take out their opponents with remarkable accuracy and efficiency.

The sea shell iPhone speaker allows you to increase the you’re iPhone’s volume requiring any additional electricity. The shell adds a beach-inspired touch to the room while its shape acts as an acoustic amplifier for the phone to facilitate hands free listening.

Why settle for transporting one measly water bottle when the six pack bike bag let’s you take up to six times the volume of liquids so you can maintain a healthy balance between hydration and inebriation. Made from waterproof canvas and velcro, it’s the ultimate bike accessory.

Look like a total badass when you pull out the bullet lighter to light yourself a smoke. This refillable gas lighter is features a study and quality design that’s complimented by a unique exterior that disguises it like a clip of machine gun shells.

Growing up doesn’t mean you have to leave your childhood behind because with the Hello Kitty breast implants you’ll be able to carry around your favorite toys wherever you go. It’s perfect for the mature woman that still wants to hold on to a small piece of her childhood.

Work on your swing rain or shine thanks to this indoor digital golf simulator that lets you can bring all the perks of the outdoors without any of the bad weather. Professional installation and an enormous screen provide the perfect day of golf without all the walking.

The reflective umbrella is the ideal companion for a stormy night out. It’s made from a highly durable and windproof material that shines bright at night when hit by light and remains a neutral grey color during the day so at not to stand out.

Turn the most welcoming room in the home into a sinister den of evil when you hang the spooky forest shadow caster. Its unique frame of clustered and intertwined sticks and twigs create the illusion you’re surrounded by a dense and unruly forest.

Leave the car at home and avoid the nuisance of rush hour traffic by hopping on one of these flying bicycles. Simply sit on the bicycle like you would any other bike and strap in as the two over-sized propellers located at each end take you on a journey of a lifetime.

Now you can collect all your favorite quest items from the Legend of Zelda with these 3D printed items. With everything from heart pieces to bombs to the Master Sword itself, these 3D printed Zelda quest items are a must have for die-hard fans.

Whoever said candy for breakfast was a bad idea clearly never started off their day with a delicious <del>and nutritious</del> bowl of gummy worms cereal. Jam packed with the essential sugars your body craves, each teeth-rotting spoonful gets you one step closer to the dentist’s office.

Become the center of attention while bicycling at night with this incredible animated wheel system. With the ability to create an endless variety of designs that appear while the wheels are in motion, this unique system will let your imagination run wild.

The zip up tie will ensure you stay looking classy and dapper even you have no idea how to tie a tie. The tie features a semi-discreet zipper running down the front that makes placing the finishing touches on your suit  easier than lacing up your velcro shoes.

The motorized kayak is your ticket to enjoying this thrilling hobby even if you lack the upper body strength to paddle continuously. No matter how long the excursion, you’ll be able to to truly appreciate the magnificent vistas surrounding you without distraction.

Join the elite ranks of the Enterprise crew once you put on the Star Trek communicator badge. This screen accurate badge was modeled from one of the original badges from the series and adheres to clothing using a powerful magnet that won’t ruin your prized uniform.

Introducing the latest breakthrough in modern medicine: the scratchable bone cast. The revolutionary design allows you to scratch anywhere an itch occurs. No longer will you have to suffer the uncomfortable sensation of shoving a stick down a cast.

Redefine what it means to go off-road with the personal all terrain vehicle. The vehicle’s breakthrough design paired alongside its tank-like wheels and 13hp engine transform the great outdoors into your own personal playground – untouched and waiting for you.

Soar higher than the father, son and the holy spirit when you take to the skies flying the Jesus kite. This holy kite depicts Jesus, dressed in his finest robes, amidst a heavenly golden background as he waves over at you from high above.

After years of yelling at your kids for drawing all over the house, you’ll finally be able to let them go wild on this unique linen. No matter how inspired your young artist becomes, specially designed pens ensure their creativity stays within the over-sized page.

Whether storming the battle of Hoth or getting a good night’s sleep, you’re likely to find yourself in the Stars Wars AT-AT bunk bed. This bunk bed’s original and awesome AT-AT frame makes this bed a no-brainer for any childrens or Star Wars aficionado’s room.

Next to meeting him in person, owning the Micheal Jordan action figure is the closest you’ll ever get to meeting His Airness. Everything from the iconic uniform to the action figure itself is crafted with extraordinary detail — it’s a must have for any serious collector.

Start your day off with excellent news with the “Today Has Been Cancelled, Go Back To Bed” pillowcase. This laziness embracing design encourages you to ignore your real world responsibilities and enjoy more of that sweet sweet morning sleep.

Stop unwelcome intruders dead in their tracks once you install the anti-burglar defense system. Perfect for defending your electricity dependent alarm system, this defense system takes a proactive approach by filling up the electrical panel with blinding pepper spray.

Get your one man wolf pack started the right way with this commanding wolf coat. Crafted out of ultra soft faux fur, this wolf coat features a detachable hoodie that’s lined with eyes and teeth, in addition to claws along the edge of the sleeves.

Tap into your inner beast once you begin working out with the primal chimp kettlebell. Forged in the shape of a  fierce chimp, this 36 lb kettlebell provides an intense and savage workout session guaranteed to awaken your primal animal within.

Super magnetic smart putty may be the key to unlocking your thinking power. This putty can be kneaded, bent, torn, molded, and pulled in any way imaginable, opening up your creative mind and energy. It’s also a strong and flexible magnet, perfect for the fridge.

Cork openers are now obsolete thanks to the revolutionary twist off cork. This new design not only symbolizes the apex of cork technology but makes it infinitely simpler to twist open your favorite bottle of wine so you nothing will stop you from getting drunk.

Keep the business cards you receive at your next conference in the briefcase business card holder. This clever case keeps business cards clean and uncrinkled, while giving the cards the proper respect they deserve. After all, business cards should be in a briefcase.

There’s only one way to take measurements at the school of hard knocks, and that’s with the machete ruler. Shaped like an undeniably bad-ass machete, this laser engraved 12 inch wooden ruler lets you complete assignments like a ruthless guerilla.

Now you can easily keep track of your sexual conquests. If promiscuity is your game, the sign-in pillow case is the right fit for you. It’s designed to look exactly like a piece of notebook paper and provides a sign-in space for all who spend the night or a few hours.

The compact rifle is the outdoorsman’s best friend when venturing into the untamed wild. Weighing a mere 3.5 lbs, this semi-automatic rifle features an innovative design that allows you to dismantle the rifle and store the parts in the butt in order to facilitate transportation.

Feel like mighty Poseidon on his throne when you sit on the fishbowl toilet. Forget about reading, now you can awe at the marine community living in your bathroom as you take care of business. Even the aptly themed toiled lid is nautically themed.

Enjoy a refreshing and delicious slushie from the comfort of home with the slushie maker. Whether you’re partial to lime, red or blue slushies, they’ll all be in your reach whenever you want; no more arduous journeys to the gas station in the searing summer heat.

Get ready to experience a thrilling and calculated game of chess, lumberjack style. The log chess set is hand carved from a single piece of wood and perfect for adding some rugged appeal to any home or man cave. It’s Bobby Fischer meets Paul Bunyan.

Sprinkle joy and happiness wherever you go when at the helm of the bubble shooting R/C helicopter. The copter  is capable of firing a stream of bubbles at the push of a button and maneuvers well indoors, while you control it from up to 32 feet away.

Stay formal while allowing your informal side to shine through by complimenting your suit or tux with the frightfully stylish Jack Skellington Cufflinks. These officially licensed cufflinks provide an elegant yet fun piece of flair great for wearing at all types of occasions.

Join the ranks of the elite mile high club without receiving any disapproving glances from other passengers afterwards with this private jet experience. You’ll be pampered with the finest amenities as you and your partner have the erotic adventure of a life time.

Trump those dinky store bought posters and show off your love of cinema like a true fan, with the giant movie wall murals. Whether you decide to immortalize the Joker, the Mask or Scarface, these custom murals compliment any decor. It’s just what the room’s been missing.

Add some rugged appeal to any indoor environment with the tree branch lights. Whether you decide to place them in the home or out in the yard, these designer tree branches provide a rustic and modern element that’ll tie together any room.

Take the insects and uncomfortable seating out of picnics as you bring them indoors with the grassy picnic table. Now no matter what the weather report looks like, nothing will stand in the way of your romantic and intimate picnic for two.

Take office chic to a whole new level when you begin toting around the clip bag. The bag transforms a mundane tool from the office world into a unique and stylish piece that compliments a variety of looks and provides a convenient space to carry your valuables in.

That’s no moon! It’s a Death Star bird house! Now you can reign supreme over your backyard while feeding your Imperial flyers with the most terrifying planet destroying high quality ceramic bird feeder on the block with this officially licensed Death Star bird house.

With the gummy bear nightlight, kids will finally be allowed to leave candy lying around their rooms without the fear of attracting ants. This oversized gummy bear comes in a variety of different <del>flavors</del> colors and emits a soothing glow when his soft stomach is pressed.

Don’t even bother calling yourself a true comic fan unless the Superman action figure is standing proudly as the centerpiece of your vast collection. It’s a masterfully sculpted action figure that portrays the last son of Krypton like you’ve never seen him before.

You’ve got downvotes! These masterfully designed soap bars mimic the Reddit notification icon and are available in two delightful fragrances – making them a perfect gift idea for the perpetually smelly, narwhal riding, 2AM chili eating neckbeard in your life.

Just because you became a parent doesn’t mean you have to leave your youthful nights of raving and clubbing behind. All you need to do is firmly strap down junior and flick the switch to activate the neon lights on this mobile party starter.

You’re so money and you know it – now dress like it with the hundred dollar bills sweater. Those around you will clamor with admiration for your sophisticated fashion taste and obvious wealth while you don this baller-esque sweater.

When you’re not busy battling for the dark side or getting force choked by Vader, get some well deserved R&R by slipping into the Storm Trooper robe.  No other article of clothing in the entire galaxy matches the comfort – or the style – of this cotton robe.

The hydraulic storage bed is a hoarder’s dream come true. The bed contains a hydraulic mechanism that lifts the entire mattress to reveal an ample storage space you can fill with whatever you wish so the room stays clutter free at all times.

The personalized signature necklace is a great way of displaying your unique written name to the world. Each necklace is custom made so you can wear yours or a significant others John Handcock. Ideal for showing affection and slightly less permanent than a tattoo.

Earn some major style points when you begin toting your loot around in the cork wallet. The fashionable cork exterior gives this bi-fold wallet an eye-catching factor and comes with a zippered back pocket and ample slots for all your cash and credit cards.

Own the most twisted garment in all Elm Street when you purchase the Freddy Krueger souls sweater. The sweater features a unique animated design that brings the tortured and tormented souls to life and takes your costume to the next level.

Explore the depths of the ocean with an iconic piece of cinema history with this fully functional Lotus Espirit submarine. Featured in the James Bond movie “The Spy Who Loved Me”, this highly desired aquatic automobile will be going up for auction soon.

Take  a piece of Tokyo greenery with you wherever you go with the faux grass iPhone case. Apart from protecting your phone, the case’s peculiar exterior, made to mimic grass from Tokyo’s Yoyogi park adds some flair to any phone.

Look like you’ve just arrived from the Land of Always Winter as  you walk in wearing the White Walker mask. Whether you’re a Game of Thrones fan or really want to terrify family and friends, this expertly crafted silicone mask  makes a great prop or collectors piece.

Welcome to Jurassic Backyard! Now you can experience what it was like to walk among dinosaurs with the life size T-Rex exhibit. The monstrous T-Rex skeleton stands over 12 feet tall and transforms any yard or home into your very own museum of natural history.

Easily identify your suitcase at the airport when travelling with the sandwich suitcase. This functional morsel of empty calories will make sure your belongings stay safe while you travel in style. Now all you need is some peanut butter and jelly styled clothing to fill it with.

Live long and prosper beyond your mortal years with these personalized 3D printed Star Trek action figures. The Star Trek figurine creation process is simple – just upload a photo of yourself, choose a body type, and let the 3D printing do its magic.

Show off your Nintendo pride with the NES controller belt buckle. This belt buckle honors the memory of the great gaming system that got so many gamers started on their favorite hobby way back in the day. And the colors look great with everyone’s wardrobe.

Gamble all your rupees away with this unique set of Legend of Zelda playing cards. These cards feature representations of the world of Zelda — keys, swords, and of course, Link himself. Fantastic for the video gamer who also loves to good card game.

Add an imaginative spin to a boring stack of documents at the home or office by binding them together with the bicycle paper clips. They’re great for placing a touch of whimsy to dull and important documents as it keeps them organized.

Whether you happen to be a rookie or a self made shark the billiard ring accommodates players of all skill levels to improve their game. It’s available in a variety of sizes and positions the cue perfectly when you have to make a shot over another ball.

Achieve an unparalleled level of stealth when you begin conducting your covert missions with the remote control hummingbird. The robotic hummingbird resembles a real life bird  to infiltrate indoor and  outdoor environments without being compromised.

As the pixelated iPhone case shows, the good old days of computing are back – minus the incessantly slow equipment. The case features a charmingly pixelated frame complimented by an eye-catching 8-bit Apple logo emblazoned over the back.

Show that you’re the ultimate Pokemon die-hard fan with the Pokemon contacts. These intriguingly designed contacts are great for costumes and turn your eyeballs into small and freaky looking Pokeballs more rare than the Master Ball.

Give a big old “fuck you!” to electricity during the next blackout by lighting up a few middle finger candles. These unique candles were made to protest nuclear energy in Japan on the anniversary of the tsunami and make an excellent conversation piece.

Combine your passion of eating and music as you rock out and melt <del>faces off</del> cheese with the delicious and badass pizza guitar. This savory one of a kind gem let’s you party hard while you munch out and entertain the hordes of <del>hungry</del> screaming fans.

Classy up your Jedi academy with the Star Wars Wampa rug. This giant throw can hang on your wall or sit on the end of your bed as a reminder that your saber skills are a force to be reckoned with, and that you are capable of surviving in the most extreme conditions.

Some people get really excited about inflatable Christmas lawn ornaments — well you can get excited about this very strange giant inflatable gargoyle. Perfect for Halloween, or any time of the year when you feel like having a gargoyle on your lawn, this thing stands 15 feet high.

As a wine aficionado, you incorporate wine paraphernalia into your decor as frequently as possible — with this giant wine cork table, you can complete that look. The giant cork can be used for your giant bottle of wine, or just as an occasional table, as pictured.

Turn casual Fridays into a geeky affair with these LED Tetris ties. These do it yourself ties cost about fifty dollars to make, and feature an impressive on-board system that plays a game of tetris all on its own – albeit not the most masterfully.

Take gaming to the next gen level with this virtual reality treadmill that translates your body movement into actual movement in the game you are playing. Not only does the experience become more immersive, but you’ll be getting a healthy dose of exercise in too!

Strike down the mightiest of foes with this incredible Zelda Master Sword fiberglass replica. This one of kind cosplay sword was masterfully designed to recreate the sword from Zelda: Twilight Princess, and also is available in the infamous Dark Link style.

A long time ago in a steampunk galaxy far, far away – or maybe just in your backyard – these beautifully crafted Star Wars vehicles roam freely. Built as an engagement present for his fiance by designer Captain Bayley, he has since gone on to make a smaller AT-ST walker too.

Show your boo how much you really care by giving her the ghetto romantic teddy bear. Raised on the streets, this teddy bear gets straight to the point as the monogrammed heart on his chest lets your little hood rat know just how fine you think she be.

Get a chance to see your name up in sparking lights even if you never make it big. The alphabet letter lights provide a distinct and soothing lighting option that will make any room pop as you display a short phrase using these porcelain lamps.

Spending the day with Jr. at the mall just got a whole lot easier thanks to the baby hanger. This ingenious hanger features specially designed hooks that allow you to safely hang your offspring from the side of the stall so both your hands remain free while you wash them.

This insanely spicy vodka is aptly named “Instant Regret Vodka” due to its high-level infusion of super hot chili peppers. It will set your mouth on fire and your heart aflame, and you may instantly regret it if you take a shot. But it will make the best Bloody Mary ever.

Enjoy a savory burger every day of the week without gaining a single pound with the hamburger dress in your stylish wardrobe. It fits comfortably and is made just the way you like it with a juicy patty complimented with lettuce, tomato and delicious melted cheese.

The lift lamp kite lantern is the only lantern that can be used as a gorgeous lamp shade or flown like a kite in the sky. The lift lamp was designed with the idea of making lamp that is fun to clean. And it is, since one can clean it by letting it shake and drift in the sky.

After countless warm beers and cold hands, you deserve a helping hand – more specifically, the giant fist drink koozie. This novelty and hilarious koozie plumps up your hand to Hulk-like proportions so your beer or soda stay ice cold without freezing your actual hand.

Avoid a messy cat or dog experience and get your little one a badass heirloom dragon. This dragon is guaranteed to be house trained and leash trained as soon as it arrives at your door – plus your kid can ride it! Just watch out for the house-destroying flames.

Light up the night in your yard by using a fireflies landscape light, a light that projects tiny specks of light wherever you point it. It will make your bushes look like they are full of fireflies and your trees like they are made of stars. Perfect for any outdoor event!

The tongue toothbrush enables you to enjoy the most exotic and best tasting dishes at the restaurant without fear of stinking up your breath for the rest of the day. A special coating on both sides freshens breath and kills bacteria while it simultaneously whitens your teeth.

The Batman tumbler replica proves you don’t have to be an incredibly gifted fighter or possess a secret hideout to be like the caped crusader, you just need to have his bulging bank account. It’s the ultimate collectible for any Batman fan or comic geek.

After a lifetime of wondering, you’ll finally know what its like to live like the disgustingly rich with the Ferrari racing experience. You’ll get to charge the Las Vegas speedway at over 100 miles per hour while you sit in the luxurious interior of Italy’s finest sports car.

The electronic goldfish is the perfect pet for the absentminded person. Whether you forget to feed it or forget it’s even there, the reliable little fish keeps on swimming no matter what. The tank also features built-in LEDs that create a cool light show as your pet swims about.

The wooden knives aren’t your everyday cutlery set; they feature an elegant maple body that extends throughout most of the knife. The wood creates an understated look that blends in with its surroundings while highlighting the razor sharp stainless steel blade.

Add some extra fun to bath time with help from the hippo bathtub plug. The plug features a standard and sturdy rubber stopper that comes with a life-like hippo head that floats just above the water’s surface to mimic how real hippos behave in their natural state.

By-pass the doubled-quilted paper towels next time there’s a mess in the kitchen and wipe it off with some bacon. The bacon kitchen towel is one long, savory and absorbent slice of bacon you can use for anything from clean ups to drying the dishes.
